summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1525, for the improvement of Post Street, from the north margin of Marion Street to the south margin of Madison Street, and from the north margin of Madison Street to the south margin of Seneca Street, all in the City of Seattle by replanking the same, under Ordinance No. 16468 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
